scripts.start: @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command $env:NODE_ENV='development'; $env:APP_NAME='%npm_package_name%'; gulp composer_clean; composer install --no-suggest; gulp
scripts.build: @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command $env:NODE_ENV='production'; $env:APP_NAME='%npm_package_name%'; gulp composer_clean; cd ./dist; composer install --no-suggest; cd ..; gulp; cd ./dist; composer update --no-dev; rm composer.json; rm composer.lock
